param.name: stretch-spaces
param.gui-description: Expand glyph and word spacing to stretch lettering over the entire path

page.name: info
page.label: This extension bends an Ink/Stitch text to a path.
Select Ink/Stitch text and a path before running this extension.
The text needs to meet these conditions:
* The text consists of only one line of text
* The text should not be too large for the given path
* Text text should not contain trim symbols
The stretch option defines whether the spaces between glyphs should be expanded so that the text stretches over the entire path.
